values:
is really good .
just so everyone knows.

me and chad got his son for the first time in over a year.
i am so excited that i can't sleep

seriously, people are freaking out over an 'invite only' party. i thought me and Dave were really good friends but apparent people are shady as fuck. i can't trust any of you motherfuckers, so i am going to stick with Chad because i KNOW he'll NEVER fuck me over.
alot of my friends are shady as fuck.

This journal is now friends only because Jennifer Rhoton likes to lurk mine & Chad's
life HARD because hers sucks THAT bad. Add me & i'll add you back if you aren't
a fucking creep!

Chad sent this to my dad last night 

"Hey I got your email from Brooke. This is Chad. I was just wanting to say how happy I am that I am marrying your daughter.  And That I'm really excited to be apart of your family.   My Family is kind of Distant and we never talk so its nice to see a family that wants to be around each other.   I just want to let you know that I love your daughter with all my heart and she  can be a handful sometimes, but I think that if me and  Brooke can work out all of our problems now then maybe we can make it as long as you and your wife have made it.  I have so much respect for Brooke because she knows what she wants and goes for it.  My family was never that encouraging and it really motivates me to see her doing all these things and making something of herself and I hope that I can be Half the person that Brooke is.  In short, I just want to say that you've raised a strong daughter and I think she's rubbing off on me because from now on I really want to accomplish any goal I set and I want to make something of myself to.   I love your Daughter with all my heart. You guys are like the family I never had.

With the upmost resect,
Chad Callis"

That is really fucking sweet. he was kinda fucked up when he sent it, but it's the thought that counts! hahaha

so i never write in this thing anymore.
and it's werid because when i was with bryce i wrote
in it all the time. and now that i dont have a boyfriend
and ALOT more time to myself, i don't write in here at all.
weriiiiiiddddddd.
welll, i'm in two colleges now. cosmetology 
and nursing. i go to school from 8 am to 9 pm
everynight of the week. and i work at rocketown on
the weekends. 

i go in the studio this saturday. 
finally. 
i'll keep everyone posted on how that goes!

new livejournal.
i might never update this
we'll see

so, this is my new start.
time to forget the past and make a new one
for myself that i can be proud of.
